description.en: Pioneering hair loss solutions through Biorenovation Technology since 2017. BAO H. LAB combines eco-friendly microorganism technology with patented formulations to deliver effective hair growth and scalp care solutions, opening infinite possibilities by blending nature and science.

description.en: The trusted choice of Korean mothers, LALUCELL provides safe, natural skincare with scientific innovation. Strictly excluding ingredients prohibited for pregnant women, we deliver effective solutions without compromise, earning recognition from the most meticulous mothers in South Korea.

description.en: Pioneering sustainable K-beauty through upcycled 'ugly food' ingredients and circular packaging. SUNNICORN transforms perfectly good produce rejected for cosmetic imperfections into powerful skincare actives, proving that true beauty comes from respecting our planet's resources while delivering sensitive skin solutions.

description.en: Pioneering plant-powered anti-aging with bakuchiol and cottonseed extract, WISMIN bridges ancient botanical wisdom with modern Korean skincare science. Our gentle yet effective formulations deliver retinol-like results without irritation, making advanced anti-aging accessible to all skin types, including the most sensitive.
